name: Bubble Buster Dopamine
description:
A game by Microbex

Bubble Buster Dopamine 'BBD' is a casual one-button mobile/desktop game with inspiration
from Flappy Bird (but easier). Try to get as far as you can. Use 'Left Mouse' / 'Arrow UP' / 'Tap Screen* to Jump.
Bursting bubbles reactivates the Jump.

I recommend playing the game in Fullscreen mode.

If you somehow can't get the Cube to Jump, click the game
window with your mouse first.

Please, leave a Comment on the game. That will motivate me
to update the game and make the game more fun to play.  Cheers! :)
